item.title: 3AM in the Hotel
item.description:
Due to my jet lag, I'm wide awake at 3AM. So I grabbed my camera and tried to look for something meaningful.

Marriott hotel (obviously better than mine)
item.content:encoded:
Due to my jet lag, I'm wide awake at 3AM. So I grabbed my camera and tried to look for something meaningful.

Marriott hotel (obviously better than mine)

Buildings here are plain but nice. Crystal clear glass windows are all over this place.

I guess most of them are office buildings but many of them are more or less lighten up. Vancouverite are hard-working people. That's why they call it No Fun City?

item.title: Capilano Suspension Bridge
item.description:
We took a free shuttle bus to the Capilano Suspension Bridge. The entrance ticket was not cheap, probably because it includes the bus fee.

Capilano Suspension Bridge (the only interesting thing in this spot)
item.content:encoded:
We took a free shuttle bus to the Capilano Suspension Bridge. The entrance ticket was not cheap, probably because it includes the bus fee.

Capilano Suspension Bridge (the only interesting thing in this spot)

item.title: Edgemont Village
item.description: Edgemont Village is a warm little town next to the Grouse Mountain. Stores there are nothing special, but for a foreigner like me, this warm vibe is pretty refreshing.
item.content:encoded:
Edgemont Village is a warm little town next to the Grouse Mountain. Stores there are nothing special, but for a foreigner like me, this warm vibe is pretty refreshing.

TBD

item.description:
